description: Entries in first n rows of Pascal's triangle not divisible by 3.
references: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197.
A. Lakhtakia et al., Fractal sequences derived from the self-similar extensions of the Sierpi≈Ñski gasket, J. Phys. A 21 (1988), 1925-1928.
A. Lakhtakia and R. Messier, Self-similar sequences and chaos from Gauss sums, Computers and Graphics, 13 (1989), 59-62.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197.
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_
